name: Until It's Undone
description:
There's a strange town in the outskirts.
They say that something beyond belief happens there.
They say that almost eveyone who goes there does not return.
They say that the few ones who manage to return never speak about what they saw.
They also say that a entity from another world hides in the sewers, but that's irrelevant to this story.
They say the sort of things that make you too curious about unkown dangers.

The town they speak about is in front of you. Will you live to tell the tale?

Unit it's Undone is a little experimental game I made while learning Godot. The goal for this game was to make an opposite of a point-and-click game, but keeping the eerie atmosphere and humor of some of the games in this genre.

The result is some sort of visual novel/ interactive fiction with weird puzzle minigames where everything is controlled by typing. This game also freatures atmosphere-based horror ( no gore or jumpscares ),  dark comedy and  hidden optional events.
